fields_of_interest: Agriculture, International co-operation and development, Environment, Regional Policy, Transport
eu_initiatives: European directive 2002/49/CE relating to the assessment and management of environmental noise
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: The organisation's goals are to work on the noise situation in Europe by speaking with other experts to improve the European directive 2002/49/CE. We are especially interested in the noise coming from the railways because our Citizen's association is constitued from citizens suffering day-to-day from the noise of the railways.
